snippet: As Alfie, an octogenarian waiter in “One Man, Two Guvnors,” the actor Tom Edden absorbs a variety of physical abuses.
abstract: Tom Edden plays octogenarian waiter Alfie, absorbing a punishing assortment of physical abuse in Richard Bean's British comedy now on Broadway, One Man, Two Guvnors; Edden was nominated for a Tony award for his role.
lead_paragraph: As Alfie, an octogenarian waiter in “One Man, Two Guvnors,” the actor Tom Edden absorbs a variety of physical abuses.

headline.seo: Tom Edden in ‘One Man, Two Guvnors’
headline.main: Nimble Clown Playing Old in Rough-and-Tumble Role
headline.print_headline: Nimble Clown Playing Old In Rough-and-Tumble Role
